Sam 'Ace' Rothstein.Action: Says 'When you love someone, you've gotta trust them. There's no other way... I believed that's the kind of love I had.'
Immaculately dressed, carefully overseeing the casino floor, lighting a cigarette calmly.
Ace was so skilled at handicapping horses that he could influence the odds for every bookmaker in the country and was rewarded with running one of the biggest casinos in Las Vegas.
Ace is described as immaculately dressed and confident while overseeing the casino floor, symbolizing control and authority.
Despite his competence, Ace gets blown up in a car explosion, indicating a vulnerability or failure to foresee or prevent a critical threat.
Looks over the casino he rules, showing confident oversight and control.
Voice-over reflects on how the operation should have been perfect but was ultimately ruined due to errors.
Greeted by casino execs and treated with respect, implying earned trust.
Reflects on past as a bookie and gambler while now being legitimate and running a casino, showing self-awareness but no direct warmth.
Hired an old casino pal as manager, indicating loyalty and trust toward acquaintances.
Enters casino confidently and assumes role of legitimate casino operator, hiring experienced personnel and managing operations.
Describes the casino operations with a detached, business-focused tone, emphasizing the house's winnings and the players' losses.
Admits he himself cannot enter the count room, indicating strict boundaries and a professional rather than personal involvement.
Oversees and manages casino operations with precision and vigilance, maintaining detailed control over cash handling despite internal skimming attempts.
Maintains a trusted position running the casino amid corrupt dealings and shady front men.

Trusted to run the casino, indicating confidence in his ability and competence from others.

Observes and detects manipulation of odds by others (someone changing the odds on the chalkboard after his bet).
Works relentlessly day and night to master every detail of the game he is betting on.

Strictly focused on making money for the bosses without regard for personal enjoyment or relationships.
Consistently guaranteed winner, serious and focused on making money rather than enjoyment.
